title: A formal region defines an area

content.question: A formal region defines an area in which

choices.label: a core dominates its surrounding hinterland
a transportation network links different types of land use
there is uniformity in one or more physical or human characteristics
there are significant geographic variations in physical or human characteristics
a unified government system has been established

content.answer: there is uniformity in one or more physical or human characteristics

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe spatial patterns, networks, and relationships.
